price: sa izvora iz kojeg će samo Allahovi robovi piti, i koji će kuda hoće bez muke razvoditi.
arabic: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ʿaynan yashrabu bihā ʿibādu al-lahi yufajjirūnahā tafjīran
